title: Flooding in Pakistan
description: Sukkur is the hub of a crucial irrigation network that brings water to farms throughout the Sindh province. The dark blue canals surround the white-gray city of Sukkur in both images. In the top image, the Indus River extends over its banks across many kilometers. Near the city, the river seems to be held in check by the canals and associated structures.
